participant_1.name: Lila
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and spirited, Lila loves the thrill of racing and enjoys the freedom her motorbike provides. She is also warmhearted and caring, especially towards her friends and family.
participant_1.background: my main transportation is my motorbike. i've light skin with big brown eyes. i waitress during the day to supplement my income. i wear a motorbike helmet to protect my head. its red with blue stripe so it shiny when i race.

participant_2.name: Dr. Marcus Hale
participant_2.personality: Marcus is intelligent and compassionate, with a strong desire to help others. He is thoughtful and enjoys mentoring young talents, including his daughter who is a child prodigy.
participant_2.background: i am a doctor. my daughter is a child prodigy. i'm now looking for a new job. i enjoy going to the park.
